title: Hero: Grid
code:
<gds-grid columns="12" gap="xs" width="280px">
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    grid-column="1/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="2xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Nav</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    grid-column="1/5"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Sidebar</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    grid-column="5/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Content</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
</gds-grid>
